text: Skazhi (o Mukhammad!) im (nevernym), chtoby oni prinesli chto-libo, podobnoye Koranu, chego oni nikogda ne smogut: "Yesli by lyudi i dzhinny sobralis', chtoby sozdat' podobnoye Koranu s yego myslyami, znacheniyami, rassuzhdeniyami, oni by ne sozdali podobnogo yemu, dazhe yesli by oni vse vmeste nad etim trudilis'
